input.sentences: volunteers came to beautify the school .
outlines were drawn on the walls so students could fill them in .
the images they painted are educational .
output.sentences: Early one Saturday, volunteers arrived at the school football field to help beautify the halls.
Walls were prepared by the students with outlines of mascots and other inspiration.
Parents and students both volunteered their time, because they knew it would take lots of people.
The painted images were not only fun, but educational as well.
These inspirational images brought a new sense of pride throughout the school.
